column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Your Pro-Life stance seems to be a big issue in your campaign .
#Text=What are your thoughts on Scott Roeder , who assassinated George Tiller ?
#Text=Was this action justified ?
#Text=How far are you willing to go to end abortion ?
#Text=I believe abortion is a form of murder .
#Text=And I told the Range News in Wilcox , that with abortion American society has “ become its own worst terrorist . ”
#Text=During an abortion , a baby is systematically dismembered in the mother 's womb , then suctioned out .
#Text=I mean , c'mon !
#Text=Yet even with all this ( some 4,000 abortions a day in America now ) , I do n't condone the George Tiller killing .
#Text=Because , well , it 's yet another ' killing . '
#Text=As I mentioned earlier , I do n't believe in the death penalty in any form – even a pro-life vigilante one .

#Text=I give talks all over the country explaining that I believe that if pro-life people really want to end this evil , they need to organize – much better than they are now – and take to the streets en mass , day in and day out , the same as what was mobilized in the South to end the evil of Segregation .
#Text=( We 've reached the 50 million abortion mark since 1973 .
#Text=That 's staggering ! ) )
#Text=People should regularly be out with protest signs , not just in front of abortion clinics , but in their neighborhoods .

#Text=As we 've traveled , our family has protested on neighborhood street corners and in front of abortion clinics in California , Michigan , Massachusetts , Ohio , Florida , North Dakota ... And we 'd be doing the same as the First Family , I told the Lewiston Argus newspaper in Montana . )
#Text=What 's more , the newspapers should be flooded with an avalanche of pro-life letters to the editor .
#Text=Legislator offices should be deluged with pro-life letters .
#Text=A lot of people in the South did n't want Segregation to end , but they wanted the protests to end even more .
#Text=So , eventually , Segregation ended .
#Text=It could well be the same with abortion .

#Text=Note : As I mentioned earlier , I would also work stridently to help end precipitating factors ( poverty , dysfunctional family dynamics , relaxed sexual mores , alcohol and drug addiction ... ) that lead to many abortions .
#Text=As I would work to highlight models for the many crisis pregnancy centers we 've researched across the country .
#Text=Centers that provide food , shelter , clothing , college scholarship money , day care ... for moms ( and dads ) who want to keep their baby .
#Text=We ’ve researched these centers in Minnesota , Indiana , Rhode Island …
#Text=For more on our stance on abortion , see :
#Text=or for a more in-depth paper , see
#Text=What are your thoughts on President Obama ?
#Text=Mixed .
#Text=Given , for instance , my stance on abortion ( last answer ) , I find Mr. Obama 's strong backing of abortion extremely troubling .

#Text=Conversely , I find his efforts toward scaling back nuclear weapons , cutting down on greenhouse gases , getting more access to healthcare for individuals ... as commendable ( and in line with the Consistent Life Ethic I espouse ) .
#Text=I would , however , push for much stronger action on each of these fronts .
#Text=( Granted President Obama might have as well in some of these categories , but , as has been the case with healthcare , he has been hamstrung to a degree by Congress . )
#Text=I do disagree with the president 's troop surge strategy in Afghanistan .
#Text=I believe this will lead to a situation analogous to what essentially devolved into the ' Iraq quagmire . '
#Text=And I believe the stepped up drone attacks in the mountain region between Pakistan and Afghanistan is a mistake , considering all the civilians being killed .
#Text=( What we so often refer to as a war 's “ inevitable collateral damage , ” is : children , moms , dads ... )
#Text=Admittedly however , when it comes to both Afghanistan and Iraq , Mr. Obama inherited tremendous dilemmas , with no easy solutions .
#Text=On the environmental/energy front , I strongly disagree with Mr. Obama 's plans for more drilling offshore in the Atlantic , and promoting a new generation of nuclear energy plants ...
#Text=For more on our energy policy , see :

#Text=In regard to personal characteristics , I do admire Mr. Obama 's tenacity , which was demonstrated graphically in the last election process and with his relentless pursuit of the healthcare bill .
#Text=An addendum :
#Text=There has been much written about Mr. Obama 's oratory skills and negotiating skills .
#Text=Yet I believe this has to be weighed in the context of :
#Text=Is he saying the right stuff ?
#Text=Is he negotiating for the right stuff ?
#Text=In my opinion , not always .
